text: Klassekampen is a Norwegian newspaper. The newspaper is leftist.https://snl.no/Klassekampen_-_avis. SNL.no As of 2021, it was the ninth largest newspaper in the country.https://medienorge.uib.no/statistikk/medium/avis/190 . Retrieved 2022-10-28 ==Sources== Category:Newspapers
title: Klassekampen
